text:
BREAKING: China just released a new AI model.

And no. This is NOT about DeepSeek:

Kimi is another ChatGPT moment for China.

☑ +24 million users (!!).
☑ Completely free to use on kimi(.)com.
☑ Open-source. Cheap API. State-of-the-art.

My favorite use case is their "Researcher" tool.

1. Go to kimi(.)com & click the "Researcher" button.
2. Ask for a detailed report, like my video:

Prompt: "Create a full article about the band 'Coldplay', from before their start until the super viral CEO/affair scandal. Add the right typos & images that fit Coldplay's branding."

Kimi will ask questions. I said, "Include everything."

And the results are fascinating:
→ It's quite long to generate (30 min), but unmatched.
→ An entire blog, with images & over 170 sources.
→ A shareable link you can send to your team.

US companies battle for closed-source AI (ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini...). But China is building at neck-breaking speed the best open-source AI.

Chinese competition is so fierce they simply have to be the best... at the cheapest price... as fast as possible.

Don't underestimate Chinese AI models. Ever.
